extract.description: Create a new policy file that only contains paths pointing within a specific prefix

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: prefix that all resources path should be within, even relative ones

args.name: DESTINATION
args.description: desired new path of the policy file

locate.description: Prints the location of the policy file, complaining if some common misconfiguration

strict.name: strict
strict.description: exits with an error if policy is misconfigured

mv.description: Move a policy file to a new location, rewriting resource paths as needed

args.name: DESTINATION
args.description: desired new path of the policy file

run.description: Prints the location of the policy file, complaining if some common misconfiguration

interactive.name: interactive
interactive.description: allow prompting for interactions regarding policies

integrity:add.description: Adds integrity values for a location.

algorithm.name: algorithm
algorithm.description: digest algorithm to use for integrity checks

discard.name: discard
discard.description: discards other integrities for the resources

integrity:delete.description: Removes integrity values for a location.

integrity:verify.description: Checks integrity values for a location.

integrity:view.description: Shows all integrity values for a location.
